_comment_description: Students complete a table by filling in missing information from the reading passage.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 1/2/3, organized information, comparisons, data presentation
prompt: Complete the table below. Choose NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS from the passage for each answer.

_field_descriptions.prompt: Instructions for completing table with word limit from passage
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Array of words/phrases from passage for each table cell

_validation_rules.answer_key: Array of exact words/phrases from the passage
_validation_rules.passage_verification: All answers must exist in reading passage
_validation_rules.table_coherence: Answers must fit logically in table structure

_grading.array_order: Answers correspond to table cells in reading order
